alert.note: Alert for Inyo; San Bernardino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 01 at 11:48PM PDT until September 02 at 4:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Southeastern Inyo County in south central California... San Bernardino County in southern California... * Until 400 AM PDT. * At 1148 PM PDT, local law enforcement reported flash flooding from heavy rain that fell earlier this evening on State Route 127 between Baker and Shoshone. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rainfall SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of normally dry washes, roads and low- lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... State Route 127 between mile markers 14 and 30. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
